summary:
## Summary

Task `add-pagination` has been completed successfully. Here's what was implemented:

### Changes Made

1. **`app/Livewire/ContractsList.php`**
   - Added `WithPagination` trait
   - Added URL-bound `$page` property with `#[Url]` attribute
   - Added `$perPage = 25` (25 contracts per page)
   - Changed `getContractsProperty()` to return `LengthAwarePaginator`
   - Added page suffix "â€“ Sivu N" to title on pages > 1
   - Added `getPrevUrlProperty()` and `getNextUrlProperty()` for SEO
   - All filters now call `resetPage()` to reset to page 1

2. **`app/Livewire/SeoContractsList.php`**
   - Updated to return `LengthAwarePaginator` for parent compatibility

3. **`app/Livewire/CheapestContracts.php`**
   - Adapted to work with paginator (extracts collection for top 11)

4. **`resources/views/layouts/app.blade.php`**
   - Added `rel="prev"` and `rel="next"` link tags for SEO

5. **`resources/views/livewire/partials/pagination.blade.php`** (new)
   - Custom Finnish-language paginat
